title: Ticket #354: Event Log reader library segfaults upon log rotation
description:
Sergy M at CERN reports the following:

I also have found another bug in read_user_log connected with log rotation too. The problem can be simulated like this:

  1. Initialize read_user_log with EventLog file, read all events, save log state and close the log reader.
  2. Let Eventlog rotate several times (you can set MAX_EVENT_LOG to about 10kb in condor_config).
  3. initialize read_user_log with saved log state.

After that read_user_log exits with segmentation fault.
remarks: Waiting for confirmation from Sergey that this is fixed.
